markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Universal Longevity](/Feats.aspx?ID=23) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 41 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Longevity](/Feats.aspx?ID=22)

</column>

---

You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life, so you’re almost never truly untrained at a skill. You reflect on your life experiences, changing the skills you selected with [Ancestral Longevity](/Feats.aspx?ID=12) and [Expert Longevity](/Feats.aspx?ID=22).
name: Universal Longevity
